com.redhat.rhn.testing

Class RhnMockHttpServletRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • MockHttpServletRequest
      • com.redhat.rhn.testing.RhnMockHttpServletRequest

  • public class RhnMockHttpServletRequest
extends MockHttpServletRequest
    RhnMockHttpServletRequest is a mock implementation of the HttpServletRequest which fixes deficiencies in the MockObjects' implementation of MockHttpServletRequest.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      default constructor

        public java.lang.String getParameter(java.lang.String paramName)
        Override to return 'null' if the requested param doesn't exist (Mock throws an AssertionError in this case :(
        Parameters:
        paramName - name of param to look up
        Returns:
        value of paramName, or 'null' if paramName isn't in the request
